MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ST7 postcode area of Scholar Green, affecting properties in Mill Lane Birch Tree Lane, Drumber Lane and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  08:30AM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:15AM on 26th April 2021
